comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3468?focusedCommentId=16642760) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
It seems that we need to use Cython 0.28.0 or later: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/10500#issuecomment-361985501
